title: Crystal staff (perfected)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A perfected crystal staff is a powered staff that can be created in The Gauntlet from an attuned crystal staff and a crystal orb.

Crystal staff (perfected)

Advanced data
Item ID23900

A perfected crystal staff is a powered staff that can be created in The Gauntlet from an attuned crystal staff and a crystal orb.

In total, a player will require 80 crystal shards, a weapon frame and a crystal orb to create the perfected crystal staff.

The staff has a max hit of 39, regardless of level.[1]

2 July 2020

The max hit of the perfected crystal staff has been increased from 34 to 39.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 18 July 2021. (Archived from the original on 26 July 2021.) Mod Ash: "Confirmed. Rather like the basic elemental spells, where the max hit is simply determined by the spell - though outside the gauntlet there are obviously more modifier effects that could be relevant."

[[File:Crystal staff (perfected) detail.png|130px|left]]
A '''perfected crystal staff''' is a [[powered staff]] that can be created in [[The Gauntlet]] from an [[crystal staff (attuned)|attuned crystal staff]] and a [[crystal orb]].

In total, a player will require 80 [[crystal shards]], a [[weapon frame]] and a crystal orb to create the perfected crystal staff.

The staff has a max hit of 39, regardless of level.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1416678805322838018|date=18 July 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/ZfBlb|archivedate=26 July 2021|quote=Confirmed. Rather like the basic elemental spells, where the max hit is simply determined by the spell - though outside the gauntlet there are obviously more modifier effects that could be relevant.|name=Confirmed max hits}}
